mapper.select: select * from lims_case_info lc where lc.INSTORED_FLAG = '1' and lc.delete_flag = '0';

select lc.CASE_ID, lc.CASE_NO, lc.MAJOR_TYPE, lc.MAJOR_NO, lc.CASE_XK_NO, lc.CASE_NAME, lc.CASE_BRIEF, lc.CASE_LOCATION, lc.CASE_DATETIME, lc.CASE_TYPE, lc.CASE_PROPERTY, lc.CASE_STATUS,lc.CASE_LEVEL, lc.CASE_REMARK, lc.CASE_URGENT_FLAG, lc.HAS_APPEND_FLAG, lc.FIRST_CHECKER, lc.SERVER_NO, lc.INSTORED_FLAG, lc.CREATE_DATETIME, lc.CREATE_PERSON, lc.UPDATE_DATETIME, lc.UPDATE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_FLAG, lc.DELETE_DATETIME, lc.DELETE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_REASON, lc.IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG, lc.IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG, lc.RESULT_QUERY_SN, lc.RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA, di_2.dict_name as CASE_TYPE_NAME, di_1.dict_name as CASE_PROPERTY_NAME, di_3.dict_name as CASE_STATUS_NAME, lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID as CONSIGNMENT_ID, lci.CONSIGNMENT_NO as CONSIGNMENT_NO, lci.DELEGATOR1_ID as DELEGATOR1_ID, lci.DELEGATOR1_NAME as DELEGATOR1_NAME, lci.DELEGATOR2_ID as DELEGATOR2_ID, lci.DELEGATOR2_NAME as DELEGATOR2_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_CODE as DELEGATE_ORG_CODE, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_NAME as DELEGATE_ORG_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_DATETIME as DELEGATE_DATETIME, lci.STATUS as STATUS, lci.ACCEPT_DATETIME as ACCEPT_DATETIME, lci.APPEND_FLAG as APPEND_FLAG from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id left join dict_item di_1 on di_1.dict_code = lc.CASE_PROPERTY and di_1.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_PROPERTY' left join dict_item di_2 on di_2.dict_code = lc.CASE_TYPE and di_2.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_TYPE' left join dict_item di_3 on di_3.dict_code = lc.CASE_STATUS and di_3.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_STATUS' where lci.delete_flag = '0' and lc.delete_flag = '0'
order by lc.case_no desc, lci.DELEGATE_DATETIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into LIMS_CASE_INFO (CASE_ID, CASE_NO, MAJOR_TYPE, MAJOR_NO, CASE_XK_NO, CASE_NAME, CASE_BRIEF, CASE_LOCATION, CASE_DATETIME, CASE_TYPE, CASE_PROPERTY, CASE_LEVEL, CASE_REMARK, CASE_URGENT_FLAG, CASE_STATUS, HAS_APPEND_FLAG, FIRST_CHECKER, SERVER_NO, INSTORED_FLAG, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, DELETE_REASON, IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG, IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG, RESULT_QUERY_SN, RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA) values (#{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseXkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseUrgentFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasAppendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstChecker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instoredFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHomicideFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCriminalFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultQuerySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultQueryCaptcha,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select lc.*, api.FULL_NAME as acceptorName from LIMS_CASE_INFO lc left join AM_PERSONAL_INFO api on api.PERSONAL_ID = lc.FIRST_CHECKER where lc.case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lc.delete_flag = '0'
select lci.* from LIMS_CASE_INFO lci, LIMS_CONSIGNMENT_INFO lc where lc.CASE_ID=lci.CASE_ID and lc.CONSIGNMENT_ID = #{consignmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lc.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0'
mapper.update: update LIMS_CASE_INFO set CASE_NO = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR_TYPE = #{majorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR_NO = #{majorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_XK_NO = #{caseXkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_NAME = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_BRIEF = #{caseBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_LOCATION = #{caseLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_DATETIME = #{caseDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_PROPERTY = #{caseProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_LEVEL = #{caseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_REMARK = #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_URGENT_FLAG = #{caseUrgentFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_STATUS = #{caseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HAS_APPEND_FLAG = #{hasAppendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_CHECKER = #{firstChecker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVER_NO = #{serverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTORED_FLAG = #{instoredFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_DATETIME = #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_PERSON = #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_REASON = #{deleteReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG = #{isHomicideFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG = #{isCriminalFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_QUERY_SN = #{resultQuerySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA = #{resultQueryCaptcha,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select lc.CASE_ID, lc.CASE_NO, lc.MAJOR_TYPE, lc.MAJOR_NO, lc.CASE_XK_NO, lc.CASE_NAME, lc.CASE_BRIEF, lc.CASE_LOCATION, lc.CASE_DATETIME,lc.XK_ANO, lc.CASE_TYPE, lc.CASE_PROPERTY, lc.CASE_STATUS,lc.CASE_LEVEL, lc.CASE_REMARK, lc.CASE_URGENT_FLAG, lc.HAS_APPEND_FLAG, lc.FIRST_CHECKER, lc.SERVER_NO, lc.INSTORED_FLAG, lc.CREATE_DATETIME, lc.CREATE_PERSON, lc.UPDATE_DATETIME, lc.UPDATE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_FLAG, lc.DELETE_DATETIME, lc.DELETE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_REASON, lc.IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG, lc.IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG, lc.RESULT_QUERY_SN, lc.RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA, di_2.dict_name as CASE_TYPE_NAME, di_1.dict_name as CASE_PROPERTY_NAME, di_3.dict_name as CASE_STATUS_NAME, lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID as CONSIGNMENT_ID, lci.CONSIGNMENT_NO as CONSIGNMENT_NO, lci.DELEGATOR1_ID as DELEGATOR1_ID, lci.DELEGATOR1_NAME as DELEGATOR1_NAME, lci.DELEGATOR2_ID as DELEGATOR2_ID, lci.DELEGATOR2_NAME as DELEGATOR2_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_CODE as DELEGATE_ORG_CODE, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_NAME as DELEGATE_ORG_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_DATETIME as DELEGATE_DATETIME, lci.STATUS as STATUS, lci.ACCEPT_DATETIME as ACCEPT_DATETIME, lci.APPEND_FLAG as APPEND_FLAG, lci.acceptor_id as ACCEPTOR_ID from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id left join dict_item di_1 on di_1.dict_code = lc.CASE_PROPERTY and di_1.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_PROPERTY' left join dict_item di_2 on di_2.dict_code = lc.CASE_TYPE and di_2.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_TYPE' left join dict_item di_3 on di_3.dict_code = lc.CASE_STATUS and di_3.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_STATUS' where lci.delete_flag = '0' and lc.delete_flag = '0'
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT count(lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID) from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id where lci.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lc.DELETE_FLAG = '0'

sql.if: and exists (select p.person_id from LIMS_PERSON_INFO p where p.consignment_id=lci.consignment_id and p.person_name like '%'||#{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')

and exists (select p.person_id from LIMS_PERSON_INFO p left join PERSON_DETAIL pd on p.person_detail_id=pd.person_detail_id where p.consignment_id=lci.consignment_id and pd.person_id_card like '%'||#{personIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
and exists (select lsid.CASE_ID from LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid where lc.CASE_ID=lsid.CASE_ID and lsid.SAMPLE_NO like '%'||#{sampleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
and exists (select lsid.CASE_ID from LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid where lc.CASE_ID=lsid.CASE_ID and lsid.SAMPLE_NAME like '%'||#{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
and exists (select p.person_id from LIMS_PERSON_INFO p where p.consignment_id=lci.consignment_id and p.person_name like '%'||#{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')

and exists (select p.person_id from LIMS_PERSON_INFO p left join PERSON_DETAIL pd on p.person_detail_id=pd.person_detail_id where p.consignment_id=lci.consignment_id and pd.person_id_card like '%'||#{personIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
and lc.CASE_ID in (select lsid.CASE_ID from LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid where lsid.SAMPLE_NO like '%'||#{sampleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
and lc.CASE_ID in (select lsid.CASE_ID from LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid where lsid.SAMPLE_NAME like '%'||#{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')

mapper.update: UPDATE lims_case_info lc set lc.HAS_APPEND_FLAG = #{hasAppendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lc.CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select lc.CASE_ID, lc.CASE_NO, lc.MAJOR_TYPE, lc.MAJOR_NO, lc.CASE_XK_NO, lc.CASE_NAME, lc.CASE_BRIEF, lc.CASE_LOCATION, lc.CASE_DATETIME, lc.CASE_TYPE, lc.CASE_PROPERTY, lc.CASE_STATUS,lc.CASE_LEVEL, lc.CASE_REMARK, lc.CASE_URGENT_FLAG, lc.HAS_APPEND_FLAG, lc.FIRST_CHECKER, lc.SERVER_NO, lc.INSTORED_FLAG, lc.CREATE_DATETIME, lc.CREATE_PERSON, lc.UPDATE_DATETIME, lc.UPDATE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_FLAG, lc.DELETE_DATETIME, lc.DELETE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_REASON, lc.IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG, lc.IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG, lc.RESULT_QUERY_SN, lc.RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA, di_1.dict_name as CASE_STATUS_NAME, lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID as CONSIGNMENT_ID, lci.CONSIGNMENT_NO as CONSIGNMENT_NO, lci.CREATE_PERSON as CREATE_PERSON, lci.CREATE_DATETIME as CREATE_DATETIME from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id left join dict_item di_1 on di_1.dict_code = lc.CASE_STATUS and di_1.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_STATUS' where lci.delete_flag = '0' and lc.delete_flag = '0' and lc.CASE_ID = #{entity.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lci.APPEND_FLAG = '1'
SELECT count(lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID) from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id where lci.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lc.DELETE_FLAG = '0'

select lci.*, di_1.dict_name as casePropertyName, di_2.dict_name as caseTypeName from LIMS_CASE_INFO lci left join LIMS_CONSIGNMENT_INFO lc on lci.case_id = lc.case_id left join dict_item di_1 on di_1.dict_code = lci.CASE_PROPERTY and di_1.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_PROPERTY' left join dict_item di_2 on di_2.dict_code = lci.CASE_TYPE and di_2.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_TYPE' where lc.CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lc.CONSIGNMENT_ID = #{consignmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lc.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0'

select count(distinct lc.CASE_NO) from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.CASE_ID left join lims_sample_info_dna si on si.case_id=lc.case_id and si.instored_flag='1' where lc.delete_flag = '0' and lci.APPEND_FLAG='0'
and lci.CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and lc.CASE_ID in (select distinct(qs.foreign_id) from queue_sample qs where qs.foreign_id = si.case_id and qs.queue_type='15')
and lc.CASE_ID in (select distinct(si.case_id) from queue_sample qs where qs.foreign_id = si.sample_no and qs.queue_type='16')
and exists (select 1 from lims_sample_info_dna si where si.case_id=lc.case_id and si.SAMPLE_NO=#{sampleNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select lc.CASE_ID, lc.CASE_NO, lc.MAJOR_TYPE, lc.MAJOR_NO, lc.CASE_XK_NO, lc.CASE_NAME, lc.CASE_BRIEF, lc.CASE_LOCATION, lc.CASE_DATETIME, lc.CASE_TYPE, lc.CASE_PROPERTY, lc.CASE_STATUS,lc.CASE_LEVEL, lc.CASE_REMARK, lc.CASE_URGENT_FLAG, lc.HAS_APPEND_FLAG, lc.FIRST_CHECKER, lc.SERVER_NO, lc.INSTORED_FLAG, lc.CREATE_DATETIME, lc.CREATE_PERSON, lc.UPDATE_DATETIME, lc.UPDATE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_FLAG, lc.DELETE_DATETIME, lc.DELETE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_REASON, lc.IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG, lc.IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG, lc.RESULT_QUERY_SN, lc.RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA, lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID as CONSIGNMENT_ID, lci.CONSIGNMENT_NO as CONSIGNMENT_NO, lci.DELEGATOR1_ID as DELEGATOR1_ID, lci.DELEGATOR1_NAME as DELEGATOR1_NAME, lci.DELEGATOR2_ID as DELEGATOR2_ID, lci.DELEGATOR2_NAME as DELEGATOR2_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_CODE as DELEGATE_ORG_CODE, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_NAME as DELEGATE_ORG_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_DATETIME as DELEGATE_DATETIME, lci.STATUS as STATUS, lci.ACCEPT_DATETIME as ACCEPT_DATETIME, lci.APPEND_FLAG as APPEND_FLAG, lci.acceptor_id as ACCEPTOR_ID, lci.ACCEPT_ORG_ID as userOrdId from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id where lc.delete_flag = '0' and lc.CASE_STATUS='02' and lc.CREATE_DATETIME >= to_date('2019-04-01','yyyy-MM-dd') and lc.case_xk_no <>'无' AND lc.case_xk_no is not null

select lc.CASE_ID, lc.CASE_NO, lc.MAJOR_TYPE, lc.MAJOR_NO, lc.CASE_XK_NO, lc.CASE_NAME, lc.CASE_BRIEF, lc.CASE_LOCATION, lc.CASE_DATETIME, lc.CASE_TYPE, lc.CASE_PROPERTY, lc.CASE_STATUS,lc.CASE_LEVEL, lc.CASE_REMARK, lc.CASE_URGENT_FLAG, lc.HAS_APPEND_FLAG, lc.FIRST_CHECKER, lc.SERVER_NO, lc.INSTORED_FLAG, lc.CREATE_DATETIME, lc.CREATE_PERSON, lc.UPDATE_DATETIME, lc.UPDATE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_FLAG, lc.DELETE_DATETIME, lc.DELETE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_REASON, lc.IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG, lc.IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG, lc.RESULT_QUERY_SN, lc.RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA, lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID as CONSIGNMENT_ID, lci.CONSIGNMENT_NO as CONSIGNMENT_NO, lci.DELEGATOR1_ID as DELEGATOR1_ID, lci.DELEGATOR1_NAME as DELEGATOR1_NAME, lci.DELEGATOR2_ID as DELEGATOR2_ID, lci.DELEGATOR2_NAME as DELEGATOR2_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_CODE as DELEGATE_ORG_CODE, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_NAME as DELEGATE_ORG_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_DATETIME as DELEGATE_DATETIME, lci.STATUS as STATUS, lci.ACCEPT_DATETIME as ACCEPT_DATETIME, lci.APPEND_FLAG as APPEND_FLAG, lci.acceptor_id as ACCEPTOR_ID, lci.ACCEPT_ORG_ID as userOrdId from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id where lc.delete_flag = '0' and lc.CASE_STATUS='01' and lc.CREATE_DATETIME >= to_date('2019-04-01','yyyy-MM-dd') and lc.case_xk_no <>'无' AND lc.case_xk_no is not null

select lc.CASE_ID, lc.CASE_NO, lc.MAJOR_TYPE, lc.MAJOR_NO, lc.CASE_XK_NO, lc.CASE_NAME, lc.CASE_BRIEF, lc.CASE_LOCATION, lc.CASE_DATETIME, lc.CASE_TYPE, lc.CASE_PROPERTY, lc.CASE_STATUS,lc.CASE_LEVEL, lc.CASE_REMARK, lc.CASE_URGENT_FLAG, lc.HAS_APPEND_FLAG, lc.FIRST_CHECKER, lc.SERVER_NO, lc.INSTORED_FLAG, lc.CREATE_DATETIME, lc.CREATE_PERSON, lc.UPDATE_DATETIME, lc.UPDATE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_FLAG, lc.DELETE_DATETIME, lc.DELETE_PERSON, lc.DELETE_REASON, lc.IS_HOMICIDE_FLAG, lc.IS_CRIMINAL_FLAG, lc.RESULT_QUERY_SN, lc.RESULT_QUERY_CAPTCHA, lci.CONSIGNMENT_ID as CONSIGNMENT_ID, lci.CONSIGNMENT_NO as CONSIGNMENT_NO, lci.DELEGATOR1_ID as DELEGATOR1_ID, lci.DELEGATOR1_NAME as DELEGATOR1_NAME, lci.DELEGATOR2_ID as DELEGATOR2_ID, lci.DELEGATOR2_NAME as DELEGATOR2_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_CODE as DELEGATE_ORG_CODE, lci.DELEGATE_ORG_NAME as DELEGATE_ORG_NAME, lci.DELEGATE_DATETIME as DELEGATE_DATETIME, lci.STATUS as STATUS, lci.ACCEPT_DATETIME as ACCEPT_DATETIME, lci.APPEND_FLAG as APPEND_FLAG, lci.acceptor_id as ACCEPTOR_ID, lci.ACCEPT_ORG_ID as userOrdId from lims_case_info lc left join lims_consignment_info lci on lci.CASE_ID = lc.case_id where lc.delete_flag = '0' and lc.CREATE_DATETIME >= to_date('2019-04-01','yyyy-MM-dd') and (lc.case_xk_no <>'无' or lc.case_xk_no is not null)
select lci.* from LIMS_CASE_INFO lci where lci.CASE_NO = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lci.delete_flag = '0'
